POICache Class Reference

Contains pixelboxes to be checked for overlap, prevents unnecessary loading from disk. More...

#include <POICache.h>

List of all members.

The name of the poi to be inserted, key for the POIData.

Creates a POIObject, calculates the visible size of the image and calcs the offset point for the image rect. POIData that will contain the inserted POIData when calculation and insertion is completed.

True if the operation was successful. False if NOT.

  • bool createAndInsert (const MC2String &name, POIData &data)
  • cache_t m_dataStore
    The non-overlapping boxes are stored here.

Detailed Description

Contains pixelboxes to be checked for overlap, prevents unnecessary loading from disk.
